definition: Uluru, massive sandstone outcrop in central Australia
abbr. for Ukraine 烏克蘭|乌克兰[Wu1 ke4 lan2]/surname Wu
(bound form) crass/stupid/rude/(used to represent the sounds of "ru", "lu" etc in loanwords)
surname Lu/Lu, ancient state of China 魯國|鲁国[Lu3 guo2]/Lu, short name for Shandong 山東|山东[Shan1 dong1]
(bound form) crass/stupid/rude/(used to represent the sounds of "ru", "lu" etc in loanwords)
surname Lu/Lu, ancient state of China 魯國|鲁国[Lu3 guo2]/Lu, short name for Shandong 山東|山东[Shan1 dong1]

sentences.english: Visitors to Uluru can do many things at this amazing site.
sentences.chinese: 到烏魯魯這塊奇妙之地的遊客可以從事許多活動。

sentences.english: At sunset, Uluru sometimes looks like it is glowing red.
sentences.chinese: 日落時分，烏魯魯有時候看起來是紅彤彤的。

sentences.english: The next day after we arrived at Uluru, we went on a camel ride.
sentences.chinese: 在我們到達烏魯魯的第二天，我們騎上了駱駝。

sentences.english: Before arriving Australia, I didn't know anything about the monolith, Uluru .
sentences.chinese: 在去澳洲之前，壓根不知道有這一塊大石頭，烏魯魯。

sentences.english: Aboriginals have considered Uluru a holy place for thousands of years.
sentences.chinese: 原住民幾千年來都視烏魯魯爲一塊聖地。

definition: Northern Territory, sparsely populated federal territory extending from center to north of Australia

pinyin: Ni2 ya4 jia1 la1 Pu4 bu4

definition: to camp/to pitch camp/stationed/quartered/Taiwan pr. [zha2 ying2]
Angkor Wat, temple complex in Cambodia
Goddess peak (Nepalese: Sagarmatha, Sky Goddess)/refers to Mt Chomolungma or Qomolangma (Tibetan), Chinese 珠穆朗瑪峰|珠穆朗玛峰/Mt Everest
